title: Cubemen2.v1.15.MacOSX.Cracked-CORE
description:
Cubemen 2 is a fast paced, action packed, original 3D Strategy game where you use your little Cubemen units to defend and attack enemies in a range of awesome game modes including CTF, Skirmish, Territory and more.

9/10 - Gamers Xtreme

For the multi-player enthusiasts, you can compete in up to 6 player online Solo or Team battles against other humans or AI, for the top spot on the global rankings. Host your own online games or join other games in the easy to use game lobby.

All multi-player games are cross-platform so play OSX against iOS.

For those that prefer the single-player experience, Cubemen 2 offers 2 unique single-player game modes plus a Campaign mode, all with online rankings so you can compete against the worlds best.

Cubemen 2 offers enough variety to satisfy everyones strategy gaming needs.

Ã¢â€“Â  New Cubemen Original Soundtrack available at.. 

Check out the trailer... 

Play on an almost endless supply of new and exciting user generated levels, or launch the easy to use built in level editor and make and share your own. All levels are stored locally so you can play your favorites when offline.

Key Features:
Ã¢â€“Â  Five outstanding game modes including CTF, Territory and Rescue!
Ã¢â€“Â  Customisable unit skins... Play as Cowboys, Knights or even Luchadores!
Ã¢â€“Â  Built in Level Editor to play and share your own levels
Ã¢â€“Â  Customisable level themes... Choose from over 20 styles
Ã¢â€“Â  No static towers. Move your Cubemen around the level and attack or defend at will
Ã¢â€“Â  Campaign mode where you compete against others for a global ranking
Ã¢â€“Â  Up to 6 player cross-platform multi-player carnage
Ã¢â€“Â  Find new online levels to play with a single click
Ã¢â€“Â  Nine specialised unit types including path blockers, mines and freeze lightning
Ã¢â€“Â  Real 3D levels with Teleporters, Healing Stations and floating platforms
Ã¢â€“Â  Online ranking for all game modes
Ã¢â€“Â  Teams and individual multi-player games against Humans, AI or both!
Ã¢â€“Â  Clean, rich and simplistic visuals that keep the focus on the strategy
Ã¢â€“Â  Over 100 user levels to play already!

Whats New in Version 1.12
We have been working hard to locate and eliminate as many bugs and crash issues as possible and thank everyone for their patience so far.

Improvements
- Improved performance on all platforms
- Reduced memory usage on all platforms

Fixes
- Fixed "Create Level" thumbnail going white after deleting a user level
- Fixed potential crash when restarting games in Defense, Campaign and Skirmish modes
- Fixed top down camera being wrong orientation
- Fixed potential crash bug in level editor with cancel button
- Fixed help text starting too low in help screen
- Fixed crash when setting password for private network games
- Fixed bug where you could buy units with no cubes
- Fixed cancelling IAP might crash

If you are having trouble launching Cubemen 2 on OSX, please follow these steps...

delete your "com.3sprockets.cubemen2osx.plist" file from your "~/Library/Preferences/" folder
and
delete your "com.3sprockets.cubemen2osx.savedState" from your "~/Library/Saved Application State/" folder

And please contact us directly via our support link on our store page if that doesn't work so we can get you up and running. Thanks.

What's New in Version 1.15
Bring version in line with new Cubemen 2 version for iOS and Steam
